Class ZooKeeperConnector

    A ZooKeeper connector, maintains a ZooKeeper connection.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZooKeeperConnector

        public ZooKeeperConnector(String zkConnectionStr,
                          String zNodePath,
                          int sessionTimeout,
                          ZooKeeperListener listener)
        Creates a connector.
        Parameters:
        zkConnectionStr - a connection string containing a comma separated list of host:port pairs, each corresponding to a ZooKeeper server
        zNodePath - a zNode path e.g. "/groups/productionGroups"
        sessionTimeout - Zookeeper session timeout in milliseconds
        listener - ZooKeeperListener

        public void close(boolean active)
        Closes the underlying Zookeeper connection.
        Parameters:
        active - if it is closed by user actively ? or passively by program because of underlying connection expires
